input_text.Prompt:
Walmart Canada has taken down its online photo processing store following a "potential compromise of customer credit card data."

The chain said it was recently informed of the potential breach of its Photocentre website.

"We immediately launched an investigation and will be contacting customers who may be impacted," Walmart said. "At this time, we have no reason to believe that Walmart.ca, Walmart.com or in-store transactions are affected. "

The chain has immediately suspended the photo website and all mobile applications pending an investigation. The chains recommends that anyone concerned by the breach should monitor card transactions closely, and immediately alert the financial institution involved about any unauthorized charges.

The Globe and Mail, citing an unnamed source, says as many as 60,000 people could be impacted.

Generate a summary:
input_text.Response A: Walmart Canada has taken down its online photo processing store following a "potential compromise of customer credit card data."
input_text.Response B:
Sure, here is a summary of the topic you requested:

Walmart Canada has taken down its online photo processing store after a potential compromise of customer credit card data. The company was informed of the potential breach of its Photocentre website and has launched an investigation. They have also suspended the photo website and all mobile applications pending the investigation. Customers who may be impacted are advised to monitor their card transactions closely and alert their financial institution about any unauthorized charges. The potential breach may have affected as many as 60,000 people, according to an unnamed source.

Is there anything else you would like to know about this topic? I will be happy to help.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.

label_annotations.feedback: Response A although to the point is very short. Response B carries out the task and is a good summary.
